ovdesc.p: This table defines the basic parameters of a product.
Short Name and Description. Once this has been setup it is possible input units and the more detailed product definition (SY.PRODUCT.DEFINITION)

desc.p: The product defintion (for existing products) of this product.
A short description of the product, used as enrichment throughout the module.
A textual description of the product.
Contains all the Override messages which the user agreed to during Input.
In the event that the user confirms the Override, the full text of the actual Override Message will be stored, for reference purposes only, in this multivalue field.
